import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TeacherDetails=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const navigate=useNavigate();const[teacher,setTeacher]=useState({name:'',age:'',address:'',phone_number:'',experience:'',classes:[]});const[allClasses,setAllClasses]=useState([]);// For listing all available classes
const[newClassId,setNewClassId]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);// Fetch teacher and class details on component load
